io.vertx.ext.web.api.validation

Interface ValidationHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Handler<RoutingContext>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HTTPOperationRequestValidationHandler, HTTPRequestValidationHandler, OpenAPI3RequestValidationHandler
    Deprecated. 
    You should use the new module vertx-web-openapi

    @Deprecated
public interface ValidationHandler
extends Handler<RoutingContext>
    Base interface for validation. For basic HTTP Request Validator, use HTTPRequestValidationHandler
    Author:
    Francesco Guardiani @slinkydeveloper

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.vertx.core.Handler

        handle
